metadata.description: Feature development workflow skills for structured software development with brainstorming, planning, task management, execution, review, and learning capture

plugins.name: workflow
plugins.description: Complete feature development workflow: brainstorm (idea to validated design), plan (design to implementation plan), beads (plan to intent-based tasks), execute (tasks to working code), review (parallel agent code review), compound (capture learnings). Requires br (beads-rust) CLI for task management.
